## Usage

```{r lib-ex}
library(zeekr)

# current version
packageVersion("zeekr")

```

```{r ex-01}
loc <- pcap_to_zeek(system.file("pcap/ssh.pcap", package = "zeekr"))

list.files(loc)

zeek <- read_zeek_logs(loc)

str(zeek, 3)
```
